info.title: Accio Hacks
info.author: James0x57
info.details:
The Official WiiRD Code Database App.
  
  Features:
  * Access all the latest codes for Wii games and Channels- including VC and WW- right from the hackers by connecting to GeckoCodes.org and downloading them right to your SD Card!
  * Edit and Enable codes to create the gct file that Gecko OS can apply to your game!
  * Automatically be notified of, and apply, Accio Hacks updates when they happen!
  * SD Cards can be swapped out whenever you'd like for any reason you may have!
  * A complete user interface resembling the WiiRD Code Database that makes all of the above quick and easy!
  * Full support for Wii Remote, Classic Controller, and the GCN Controller!
